author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: EchoEar is a compact AI development kit for voice interaction and edge AI applications. It targets use cases such as smart toys, voice-enabled speakers, and control systems. The device features a circular touch display, dual microphones with local wake-word detection and sound localization, and supports large model integration from OpenAI, Xiaozhi AI, and Gemini. The […]
title: EchoEar Development Kit Targets Voice Interaction and Edge AI Applications
